QuestData.Title: Zuldazar
QuestData.Description:
King Rastakhan is an ancient ruler who is not quick to trust new allies. We must earn his trust if we are to earn his fleet.
Zuldazar is the seat of power for the Zandalar empire and a good place to start in winning over these potential allies.
QuestData.RewardText: My father's trust is not easily earned.$b$bBelieve me.
